original: 統一北方的強大軍閥，挾天子以令諸侯，雖赤壁之戰敗於孫劉聯軍，仍藉強大軍勢，逐步佔關中、定西涼。
text: The powerful warlord who unified the north, took the emperor to make the princes. Although the battle of Chibi was defeated by the Sun and Liu coalition forces, they still took advantage of the powerful army to gradually occupy Guanzhong and Dingxiliang.
